mapper.select: SELECT no,title,poster,chef,num FROM (SELECT no,title,poster,chef,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(recipe recipe_no_pk) */ no,title,poster,chef FROM recipe)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont3,mem_cont7,num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont3,mem_cont7,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont3,mem_cont7 FROM chef ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT no,title,poster,chef,num FROM (SELECT no,title,poster,chef,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(recipe recipe_no_pk) */ no,title,poster,chef FROM recipe WHERE chef LIKE '%'||#{chef}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/9.0) FROM recipe WHERE chef LIKE '%'||#{chef}||'%'
